title: Covid-19 in India: Why second coronavirus wave is devastating
description: A deadly second wave has overrun hospitals and even crematoriums in India.

title: Coronapas: The passport helping Denmark open up after Covid
description: Football fans, museums and restaurants are opening up, but Danes will have to show a corona passport.

description: The five films cover diverse topics from bullying, a drinking experiment, and the horror of war.

title: 'My sister took her life, petrified at facing her ex in court'

title: Rare bug spotted for first time in more than 30 years
